text:
You really need to evaluate a bunch to find what works well for your
organisation as they all have their strengths and weaknesses. 
We use Tactical RMM
.
Free (with sponsorship recommended) and open source. API driven, so you can
extend and integrate relatively easily. Responsive community and developers.
Robust and easy to use. Doesn’t include the breadth of features some of the
bigger commercial products offer out of the box, but for us that’s ideal as we’d
rather keep the RMM simple and reliable and use it to leverage our preferred 3rd
party tools as required. 
Cheers, 
David
%40ausmarinetech.com.au

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] RMM Solution
